ID = rep(c(1,2,3,4), each = 3)
Letter = rep(letters[1:3], 4)
x = seq(1, 43, along.with = ID)
y = seq(-20, 0, along.with = ID)
df = data.frame(ID, Letter, x, y)
df

reshape(df, timevar = 'Letter', idvar = 'ID', direction = 'wide')
